name: C. Table Decorations
statement:
You have red, green and blue balloons. To decorate a single table for
the banquet you need exactly three balloons. Three balloons attached to
some table shouldn’t have the same color. What maximum number of tables
can be decorated if we know number of balloons of each color?Your task
is to write a program that for given values , and will find the maximum
number of tables, that can be decorated in the required manner.
